fixes.name: Delta Down CAD Diff Fix
fixes.dax_expression: 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Delta Down T CAD Fix] * 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Date Sign]
fixes.solution_explanation: This is a row-level calculation multiplying two fields available on the same row ('Delta Down T CAD Fix' and 'Date Sign'), so it is implemented as a calculated column using direct column references.
